Jackson.Hawkins Field (airport): Hawkins Field (IATA: HKS, ICAO: KHKS, FAA LID: HKS) is a joint civil-military public airport three miles northwest of Jackson, in Hinds County, Mississippi. It is owned by the City of Jackson and operated by the Jackson Metropolitan Airport Authority. The National Plan of Integrated Airport Systems for 2011–2015 called it a general aviation facility.
